DOC.brief_summary: assess the effect of dental educational program on oral hygiene among institutionalized hearing impaired and mute children in Cairo, Egypt.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Dental Educational Program on Oral Hygiene Status Among Institutionalized Deaf Children
DOC.detailed_description: - Evaluate participants satisfaction regarding the dental educational program(learning teeth brushing technique) - Measure the oral hygiene index simplified to the participants at a different follow up periods for assessing the effect of the dental educational program on oral hygiene.
DOC.criteria: Children aged from 612 years with mixed dentition. Institutionalized Deaf children in Cairo, Egypt. Children above the age of 12 years and below the age of 6 years Patient un able to give informed consent Patient suffering from any other type of disability such as (mental retardation, physically and mentally handicapped, .etc.) Medically compromised patient Patient who were absent in the day of examination
